document_data.mainbody:
hiiman the Glorious (real name Rhiiman Obarskyr) was the fifth king of Cormyr. He reigned from 66 DR until his death in 79 DR.
His namesake was his uncle, who abandoned Cormyr to go back to Impiltur when his father Faerlthanns mother (Suzara Obarskyr) got tired of his grandfather Ondeth. He was the youngest of Faerlthanns four sons but was third in their succession to the throne after he outlived Imlon, Eskruis, and his nephew Bryndar. He was succeeded by his last remaining brother, Embrus.
